resources.string: For example \"192.168.178.15\" or \"localhost\" to connect to this device
For example \"input keyevent POWER\", this will emulate a powerkey press
Emulate Ctrl+C before sending command (needed for some devices).
For example: \"50\". Lower numbers make it faster but less reliable.

Hi! Welcome to %1$s.\nThis is a Tasker (or other Locale based apps) plugin, so to use this app, you will need an app like Tasker. You can also use the app without Tasker to test if it works in your situation, however I do encourage you to try Tasker, as it\'s an amazing app and it really brings this plugin to life.
Shows a notification when an action is executed on a foreground service.
A small token of gratitude, enough for me to buy a coffee at uni
A bigger token of gratitude, enough for me to buy two cups of coffee
Even greater token of gratitude, enough for me to buy a large special coffee
Greatest token of gratitude! If you\'ve got money to spend and don\'t know how
Donating won\'t give you extra features, however, it will considerably support me, the developer, to continue making awesome apps like this one!
Thank you very much for donating! It is much appreciated :)
